title: Beloved Place!
detail_text: <:th_ch0101/>Uwaaaah! Look, our pop-ups are over there too!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>You’re right!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>They also hung up so many of our posters~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Ehehe....! I’m feeling happy, a bit embarrassed, and proud.... It feels weird to have all these emotions mixed~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>You say that, but you have a big smile on your face!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>You too, You-chan♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>And you as well, Riko-chan~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Being able to help liven up Numazu like this makes you feel happy, doesn’t it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>We should think about what else we can do after this!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Alright, let’s have a strategy meeting now!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
